articles.title: ESA's 2030+ roadmap envisions Europeans on the Moon and Mars - The Register
articles.description: But the agency is distinctly aware that it needs more autonomy
articles.content:
The European Space Agency (ESA) has released a strategy roadmap to take it into the 2030s and beyond.
The publication comes on the eve of much-anticipated images from the James Webb Space Telescope,… [+2397 chars]

articles.title: Cause of 'staggering' disease in cats in Europe unraveled - Phys.org
articles.description: A large team of researchers affiliated with multiple institutions in Germany, Austria and Sweden has found the virus behind the mysterious "staggering" disease killing cats across Europe. The group has written a paper describing their work but it has not yet …

articles.title: EU invites Marcos to visit Brussels for a meeting on foreign policy issues - GMA News Online
articles.description: The European Union (EU) has invited President Ferdinand "Bongbong" Marcos Jr. to visit its headquarters in Brussels, Belgium to discuss foreign policy issues and bilateral relations between the Philippines and the bloc.
